DOC.brief_summary: This study design determine parent deliver intervention help increase physical activity child . The parent give intervention mobile phone .
DOC.brief_title: Parent-targeted Mobile Phone Based Intervention Increase Physical Activity Children ( P-Mobile )
DOC.detailed_description: Most child engage insufficient amount moderate-to-vigorous physical activity . These low level moderate-to-vigorous physical activity associate adverse health consequence include increase risk obesity , cardiovascular diabetes risk factor . Therefore , need study increase physical activity level child . Mobile phone way deliver behavioral intervention . Mobile phone portable , allow real-time data collection , potentially reach large number people . Text message also utilized promote behavior change . Few mobile phone base intervention specifically target child physical activity . The aim pilot study determine feasibility efficacy physical activity promotion program target 6-10 year old child deliver parent mobile phone .
DOC.criteria: Parent must mobile phone . Parent must use text ( SMS ) message service mobile phone . Parent access internet mobile phone . Child 6 10 year old . Child engage regular physical activity . Chile physically capable exercising .
